column4: I have a machine (the one I'm on) on which I have ubuntu 8.04 on one partition...this has been there for some time. I just installed ubuntu 11.04 on a new partition, and I have no sound on that partition. Any help? I figure that having one partition working ought to be of some use.
It's my first time on IRC, hence the username.
install alsamixer and then check that everything is unmuted and such
the few times I've had no sound with an ubuntu install, alsamixer was the only remedy. must be certain audio hardware
